attributes.action: Restore funding to the Army Cadet Force
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Army Cadet Force provides training and education to young people in the UK. Teaches them some respect, keeps them off the streets and out of trouble and doing some form of physical activity. We need the resources to function and are the latest to suffer with the spending cuts. Please give us your support.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to restore funding to the Army Cadet Force.

Her Majesty's Government has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.hmg.gov.uk/epetition-responses/petition-view.aspx?epref=ACF-Funding


Her Majesty's Government
